Package fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.example.components

Class ClientComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.example.components.ClientComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentI
    public class ClientComponent
extends AbstractComponent
    The class ClientComponent implements a component that uses the push control of the push control plug-in to start the pushing of data from a server component and then consume these data before stopping.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant              true

    Created on : 2019-03-06

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void consumeData​(PairDataCI.PairI d)
      consume the data i.e., log it on the trace.
      void execute()
      the scenario first launch a limited series of 10 pushes every 100ms and then wait 2 seconds before starting an unlimited series of pushes every 25ms that is stopped after 1 second.
      void finalise()
      finalise the component, freeing resources that need to be, before shutting it down.
      void shutdown()
      shutdown the component; inspired from the Java Executor framework.
      void start()
      connects the data outbound port to the server side.
